item.title: Mastodon vs. Bluesky, the future of healthy social media is not there (yet)
item.description: With the increasing issues in Twitter/X governance, there is a recurring debate within Tech communities: is Mastodon or Bluesky the future? According to me, none of them.

item.title: CCS 2023, my first security conference
item.description: In November 2023, I attended my first security conference: CCS 2023. So, how was it?

item.title: My concerns about Trusted Execution Environment
item.description: In this post, I want to give my thoughts about a hot topic in privacy-enhancing technologies: Trusted Execution Environments.

item.title: APVP, the annual gathering of French privacy researchers
item.description: After the ESSA workshop, I continued my ~~holidays~~ professional travels with APVP 2023

item.title: ESSA3, an amazing workshop about Searchable Encryption
item.description: In early June 2023, Searchable Encryption researchers gathered to discuss past and future achievements in this area...and I was there!

item.title: ECML-PKDD, my first ML conference: between discovery and disillusions
item.description: I attended my first in-person conference and wanted to share the perspective of a young doctoral student full of ideals on scientific work.

item.title: Graph visualization: Scientology Web strategy
item.description: I analyze the Web territory occupation using graphs and expose the very specific strategy deployed by the Church of Scientology to "hack" the Page Rank algorithm.

item.title: Introductory courses on system and network administration
item.description: Academic project to conceive basic courses about system administration.

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.description: This is a small post to introduce you to my blog.
